00069 if (!defined('__PMA_LANG_DETECT__')) {
00070     define('__PMA_LANG_DETECT__', 1);
00083     function pmaLangDetect($str = '', $envType = '')
00084     {
00085         global $available_languages;
00086         global $lang;
00087 
00088         reset($available_languages);
00089         while (list($key, $value) = each($available_languages)) {
00090             // $envType =  1 for the 'HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE' environment variable,
00091             //             2 for the 'HTTP_USER_AGENT' one
00092             if (($envType == 1 && eregi('^(' . $value[0] . ')(;q=[0-9]\\.[0-9])?$', $str))
00093                 || ($envType == 2 && eregi('(\(|\[|;[[:space:]])(' . $value[0] . ')(;|\]|\))', $str))) {
00094                 $lang     = $key;
00095                 break;
00096             }
00097         }
00098     } // end of the 'pmcLangDetect()' function
00099         
00100 
00101 } // end if
00102 
00103 
00107 if (!empty($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE']))
00108     $HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE'];
00109 if (!empty($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTP_USER_AGENT']))
00110     $HTTP_USER_AGENT = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTP_USER_AGENT'];
00111 if (!isset($lang)) {
00112     if (isset($HTTP_GET_VARS) && !empty($HTTP_GET_VARS['lang'])) {
00113         $lang = $HTTP_GET_VARS['lang'];
00114     }
00115     if (isset($HTTP_POST_VARS) && !empty($HTTP_POST_VARS['lang'])) {
00116         $lang = $HTTP_POST_VARS['lang'];
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00124 // Lang forced
00125 if (!empty($cfgLang)) { 
00126     $lang = $cfgLang;
00127 }
00128 
00129 // If '$lang' is defined, ensure this is a valid translation
00130 if (!empty($lang) && empty($available_languages[$lang])) {
00131     $lang = '';
00132 }
00133 
00134 // Language is not defined yet :
00135 // 1. try to findout users language by checking it's HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE
00136 //    variable
00137 if (empty($lang) && !empty($HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE)) {
00138     $accepted    = explode(',', $HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE);
00139     $acceptedCnt = count($accepted);
00140     reset($accepted);
00141     for ($i = 0; $i < $acceptedCnt && empty($lang); $i++) { 
00142       pmaLangDetect($accepted[$i], 1);
00143     }
00144 }
00145 // 2. try to findout users language by checking it's HTTP_USER_AGENT variable
00146 if (empty($lang) && !empty($HTTP_USER_AGENT)) {
00147     pmaLangDetect($HTTP_USER_AGENT, 2);
00148 }
00149 
00150 // 3. Didn't catch any valid lang : we use the default settings
00151 if (empty($lang)) {
00152     $lang = $cfgDefaultLang;
00153 }
00154 
00159 $lang_file = $lang_path.$lang.'/lang_'.$lang.'_nursing.php';

00162         $lang='en';
